what: support for coalesce sorting on all supported store driver.
why: to allow sorting of first non-NULL value among given columns into one column.

what: test SMTP server button for the admin email settings.
why: to let administrators test SMTP configuration validity before deploying changes.

what: nylas integration which allows you to easily connect {PRODUCT_NAME} with email, calendar, and contacts provider.
A new page block on compose called Nylas was added, that can display Nylas components defined in the Nylas dashboard.
The Nylas external provider was also added to the list in the Admin panel under System settings.
why: to enable the integration with Nylas and support the use of its components inside {APP_NAME_COMPOSE}.

what: the labels being displayed in metric page block instead of names.
why: because we were incorrectly displaying the field names instead of its labels.
how: by changing the metric page block fields to show labels instead of names.

what: the namespace, module, page, workflow, and reporter lists to properly sort the last change column.
Previously the sorting was done on the updatedAt value and the value was shown as updatedAt or createdAt if the resource wasn't updated yet.
how: by using the coalesce (`deletedAt`, `updatedAt`, `createdAt`) to sort based on all three columns, so that the value displayed matches the value that is being used to sort.

what: invalid data ordering on {APP_NAME_COMPOSE} charts caused by improperly ordered data on the record report endpoint.
how: by adding an explicit sorting by the specified dimension field.

what: users not being able to go to the previous page on reporter tables.
how: by updating the page cursor only if it exists while creating a report paging filter to preserve the valid cursor for the next page.

what: not being able to close the workflow modal once you press `New Workflow`.
how: by adding a back button that simulates the back button behavior of the browser.

what: reporter chart display element configuration not being properly saved on creation if the chart type was changed.
how: by properly updating the chart display element options when the chart type is changed.
